review_title: Focused on staff well-being and supportive of needs
pros:
I recently had to take time off work for personal mental health reasons. I was really worried about asking for the time off as we were entering a really busy time at work but my manager and HR were extremely supportive. Through out my time off I received gentle check ins to see how I was doing - never once was I pushed into returning before I was ready. It is so refreshing to work somewhere that cares about their staffs well-being. 

My return to work after being away for 2 weeks (which I was really nervous about) couldn’t have gone better. HR ensured to check in with me and helped me prioritise what I needed to focus on.
cons: I can’t think of a con. Any issues I have had, I have raised with HR who have dealt with it quickly.
